title: Phoenix Motor Partners with Cennatic for Commercial EV Battery Solutions
summary: Phoenix Motor partners with Cennatic to provide advanced battery solutions for commercial electric vehicles, aiming to enhance performance and sustainability. The strategic alliance targets the growing EV market, projected to expand significantly by 2030.
article: Phoenix Motor Partners with Cennatic for Commercial EV Battery Solutions Rhea-AI Impact (Moderate) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Neutral) Tags partnership Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish Phoenix Motor partners with Cennatic to provide advanced battery solutions for commercial electric vehicles, aiming to enhance performance and sustainability. The strategic alliance targets the growing EV market, projected to expand significantly by 2030. Phoenix Motor collabora con Cennatic per fornire soluzioni avanzate di batterie per veicoli commerciali elettrici, con l'obiettivo di migliorare prestazioni e sostenibilità. L'alleanza strategica si concentra sul crescente mercato dei veicoli elettrici, previsto in notevole espansione entro il 2030. Phoenix Motor se asocia con Cennatic para proporcionar soluciones avanzadas en baterías para vehículos comerciales eléctricos, buscando mejorar el rendimiento y la sostenibilidad. La alianza estratégica apunta al creciente mercado de vehículos eléctricos, que se proyecta se expandirá significativamente para 2030. 피닉스 모터는 상업용 전기차의 성능과 지속 가능성을 향상시키기 위해 세나틱과 협력하여 고급 배터리 솔루션을 제공합니다. 이 전략적 제휴는 2030년까지 크게 확장될 것으로 예상되는 성장하는 전기차 시장을 목표로 합니다. Phoenix Motor s'associe à Cennatic pour fournir des solutions avancées de batteries pour véhicules commerciaux électriques, visant à améliorer la performance et la durabilité. L'alliance stratégique cible le marché en croissance des véhicules électriques, prévu pour s'élargir considérablement d'ici 2030. Phoenix Motor arbeitet mit Cennatic zusammen, um fortschrittliche Batterielösungen für kommerzielle Elektrofahrzeuge zu bieten, mit dem Ziel, Leistung und Nachhaltigkeit zu verbessern. Die strategische Allianz zielt auf den wachsenden Markt für Elektrofahrzeuge ab, der bis 2030 voraussichtlich deutlich expandieren wird. Positive None. Negative None. Automotive Industry Analyst In assessing the recent partnership between Phoenix Motor Inc. and Cennatic Power, it's essential to evaluate the competitive landscape of the electric vehicle (EV) market and the strategic implications. Phoenix Motor's decision to partner for custom battery packs suggests a proactive approach to resolving a significant bottleneck for EV manufacturers, which is battery supply and technology. This move could potentially lead to cost reductions via economies of scale and improved procurement terms.Integration of Cennatic's advanced battery technology could enhance the value proposition of Phoenix Motor's EVs through longer range and reliability, a key consideration for commercial clients. As the EV market expands, driven by environmental considerations and regulatory encouragement, Phoenix's strategic alignment with a battery supplier could strengthen its market position, possibly translating to a favorable impact on stock performance. Nonetheless, one must consider execution risks and any potential delays in technology development or integration that could affect projected benefits. Environmental Sustainability Analyst From an environmental sustainability perspective, the collaboration between Phoenix Motor and Cennatic aligns with the increasing global emphasis on reducing carbon emissions. The transportation sector is a significant contributor to greenhouse gases and the shift towards electric mobility is important for meeting climate goals. Phoenix's focus on heavy-duty transit buses is particularly noteworthy, as these vehicles can have a disproportionally large impact on emissions.Investors with an interest in socially responsible investing may find Phoenix's efforts in promoting sustainable transportation attractive. However, for the long-term viability of this strategy, it is important to consider the source of electricity for charging the EVs and the lifecycle environmental impact of the batteries themselves, including recycling and disposal procedures. Financial Analyst Financially, the partnership could increase Phoenix Motor’s capital expenditures in the short term due to research and development costs. However, it might improve gross margins over time through potentially reduced battery pack costs and differentiated product features. Market growth projections from $70.9 billion to over $255 billion by 2030 indicate a significant opportunity if Phoenix captures even a fraction of this market share.Investor attention should be on how Phoenix plans to fund the partnership's developmental phase and its impact on cash flow. Additionally, the ability of Phoenix to translate this partnership into increased sales and market share will be pivotal. While the partnership is promising on paper, investors should monitor the subsequent financial quarters for evidence of ROI and the partnership's material effect on operational results. 04/23/2024 - 03:45 AM ANAHEIM, CA / ACCESSWIRE / April 23, 2024 / Phoenix Motor Inc. (NASDAQ:PEV), a leading manufacturer of heavy-duty transit buses and electrification solutions provider for medium-duty vehicles, today announced a strategic partnership with Cennatic Power ("Cennatic"), a wholly owned subsidiary of Cenntro Inc. (CENN), to supply advanced battery packs custom-manufactured for Phoenix Motor's range of commercial electric vehicles (EVs).Under the terms of the agreement, Cennatic will develop and produce battery packs specifically designed for Phoenix Motor's heavy-duty transit buses, as well as its medium- and light-duty commercial EVs."Teaming up with Cennatic allows us to integrate cutting-edge battery technology that supports the superior performance standards our customers expect from Phoenix vehicles," said Denton Peng, CEO of Phoenix Motor. "In addition to strengthening our expanding product line, this strategic alliance, which aims to enhance the efficiency, range, and reliability of our EV offerings, also reinforces our mission to lead the transition towards a more sustainable future in transportation."The heavy-duty transit bus and medium- and light-duty commercial EV markets are projected to grow from $70.9 billion in 2024 to more than $255 billion by 2030, according to data from Research and Markets.About Phoenix Motor Inc.Phoenix Motor, a pioneer in the electric vehicle ("EV") industry, designs, builds, and integrates electric drive systems and manufactures heavy duty transit buses and medium and light duty commercial EVs. Phoenix operates two primary brands, "Phoenix", which is focused on commercial products including heavy and medium duty EVs (transit buses, shuttle buses, school buses and delivery trucks, among others) and "EdisonFuture", which intends to offer light-duty EVs. Phoenix endeavors to be a leading designer, developer and manufacturer of electric vehicles and electric vehicle technologies. To learn more, please visit: www.phoenixmotorcars.com.Forward-Looking StatementsThis press release contains forward-looking statements, as that term is defined in the Private Litigation Reform Act of 1995, that involve significant risks and uncertainties. Forward-looking statements can be identified through the use of words such as "may," "might," "will," "intend," "should," "could," "can," "would," "continue," "expect," "believe," "anticipate," "estimate," "predict," "outlook," "potential," "plan," "seek," and similar expressions and variations or the negatives of these terms or other comparable terminology. Readers are cautioned not to place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements, which reflect the Company's current expectations and speak only as of the date of this release. Actual results may differ materially from the Company's current expectations depending upon a number of factors. These risk factors include, among others, those related to our ability to raise additional capital necessary to grow our business, operations and business and financial performance, our ability to grow demand for our products and revenue, our ability to become profitable, our ability to have access to an adequate supply of parts and materials and other critical components for our vehicles on the timeline we expect, the coronavirus (COVID-19) and the effects of the outbreak and actions taken in connection therewith, adverse changes in general economic and market conditions, competitive factors including but not limited to pricing pressures and new product introductions, uncertainty of customer acceptance of new product offerings and market changes, risks associated with managing the growth of the business, and those other risks and uncertainties that are described in the "Risk Factors" section of the Company's annual report filed on Form 10-K filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Except as required by law, the Company does not undertake any responsibility to revise or update any forward-looking statements.Contact:marketing@phoenixmotorcars.comDave Gentry, CEORedChip Companies, Inc.1-407-644-4256PEV@redchip.comSOURCE: Phoenix Motorcars Inc.View the original press release on accesswire.com What is the partnership between Phoenix Motor and Cennatic about? The partnership focuses on developing custom-manufactured advanced battery packs for Phoenix Motor's range of commercial electric vehicles. Who is the CEO of Phoenix Motor? Denton Peng is the CEO of Phoenix Motor. What is the ticker symbol for Phoenix Motor? The ticker symbol for Phoenix Motor is PEV. What market is projected to grow significantly by 2030? The heavy-duty transit bus and medium- and light-duty commercial EV markets are projected to grow from $70.9 billion in 2024 to more than $255 billion by 2030.

title: Honda Motor Europe Ltd. renews and expands IT partnership with Kyndryl
summary: Kyndryl (KD) and Honda Motor Europe  renew and expand their IT partnership, with Kyndryl modernizing and managing Honda's mission-critical systems through Kyndryl Bridge. The agreement aims to drive agility, standardize processes, and future-proof Honda's IT systems for a digital environment.
article: Honda Motor Europe Ltd. renews and expands IT partnership with Kyndryl Rhea-AI Impact (Low) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Neutral) Tags partnership Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish Kyndryl (KD) and Honda Motor Europe renew and expand their IT partnership, with Kyndryl modernizing and managing Honda's mission-critical systems through Kyndryl Bridge. The agreement aims to drive agility, standardize processes, and future-proof Honda's IT systems for a digital environment. Kyndryl (KD) e Honda Motor Europe rinnovano ed espandono la loro partnership IT, con Kyndryl che modernizzerà e gestirà i sistemi critici per la missione di Honda tramite Kyndryl Bridge. L'accordo mira a promuovere l'agilità, standardizzare i processi e preparare i sistemi IT di Honda per un ambiente digitale. Kyndryl (KD) y Honda Motor Europa renuevan y amplían su asociación en tecnologías de la información, con Kyndryl modernizando y administrando los sistemas críticos de Honda a través de Kyndryl Bridge. El acuerdo tiene como objetivo impulsar la agilidad, estandarizar procesos y proteger los sistemas IT de Honda para un entorno digital. 킨드릴(KD)과 혼다 모터 유럽이 IT 파트너십을 갱신하고 확장합니다. 킨드릴은 킨드릴 브릿지를 통해 혼다의 핵심 시스템을 현대화하고 관리합니다. 이 협정은 민첩성을 촉진하고, 프로세스를 표준화하며, 디지털 환경에 맞게 혼다의 IT 시스템을 미래에도 사용할 수 있도록 목표로 합니다. Kyndryl (KD) et Honda Motor Europe renouvellent et étendent leur partenariat informatique, Kyndryl se chargeant de la modernisation et de la gestion des systèmes critiques de Honda via Kyndryl Bridge. L'accord vise à accroître l'agilité, standardiser les processus et sécuriser les systèmes informatiques de Honda pour un environnement numérique. Kyndryl (KD) und Honda Motor Europa erneuern und erweitern ihre IT-Partnerschaft, wobei Kyndryl die mission-kritischen Systeme von Honda durch Kyndryl Bridge modernisiert und verwaltet. Das Abkommen zielt darauf ab, Agilität zu fördern, Prozesse zu standardisieren und die IT-Systeme von Honda für eine digitale Umgebung zukunftssicher zu machen. Positive None. Negative None. 04/23/2024 - 02:00 AM Kyndryl to modernize and manage the mission-critical systems for Honda's logistics operations with Kyndryl Bridge BRUSSELS, April 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Kyndryl (NYSE: KD), the world's largest IT infrastructure services provider, and Honda Motor Europe Ltd., announced a multiyear managed infrastructure services renewal agreement. Building on a well-established partnership, Kyndryl will continue to manage Honda's centralized IT infrastructure and modernize the company's mainframe estate with Kyndryl Bridge, Kyndryl's open integration platform, and AIOps. Honda Motor Europe Ltd. is a subsidiary of Honda Motor Co. Ltd., and is responsible for the sales, marketing and distribution of Honda products in Europe. The company offers a wide range of products, including automobiles, motorcycles, power equipment, parts, accessories and marine engines. The companies will work together to drive agility across Honda's business operations, standardize key processes, and future-proof the company's IT systems for a more digital and data-driven environment. Through the expanded agreement, Kyndryl will move critical applications to its newly upgraded z16 mainframe and infrastructure environment, allowing Honda Motor Europe Ltd. to modernize operations and optimize costs with the latest platforms and best-in-class technologies offering advanced security, reliability, scalability and performance. "We are proud to collaborate with Honda, helping them to drive agility and resiliency across their operations and harness their data through more innovative applications of IT," said Liesbet D'hoker, Managing Director of Kyndryl Belux. Going forward, Honda Motor Europe Ltd. will adopt Kyndryl Bridge to drive real-time insights of its IT operations and enhanced control over its mission-critical applications. In addition, Kyndryl is applying the full scope of its advanced delivery automation capability, including AIOps delivered through Kyndryl Bridge. This has the potential to drive faster, more secure and efficient outcomes and reduce incidents, while lowering costs. About Kyndryl Kyndryl (NYSE: KD) is the world's largest IT infrastructure services provider, serving thousands of enterprise customers in more than 60 countries. The company designs, builds, manages and modernizes the complex, mission-critical information systems that the world depends on every day. For more information, visit www.kyndryl.com. Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2394093/Kyndryl_Logo.jpg View original content to download multimedia:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/honda-motor-europe-ltd-renews-and-expands-it-partnership-with-kyndryl-302123766.html SOURCE Kyndryl What partnership renewal was announced by Kyndryl (KD) and Honda Motor Europe ? Kyndryl and Honda Motor Europe announced a multiyear managed infrastructure services renewal agreement to modernize and manage Honda's IT systems. What is Kyndryl (KD) offering to modernize Honda's mainframe estate? Kyndryl is offering Kyndryl Bridge, an open integration platform, and AIOps to modernize Honda's mainframe estate. What is the goal of the partnership between Kyndryl (KD) and Honda Motor Europe ? The goal of the partnership is to drive agility across Honda's business operations, standardize key processes, and future-proof the company's IT systems for a more digital and data-driven environment. How will Kyndryl (KD) help Honda Motor Europe optimize costs? Kyndryl will move critical applications to its upgraded z16 mainframe and infrastructure environment, allowing Honda to modernize operations and optimize costs with advanced technologies. What advanced delivery automation capability is Kyndryl (KD) applying in the partnership? Kyndryl is applying AIOps delivered through Kyndryl Bridge to drive faster, more secure and efficient outcomes, reduce incidents, and lower costs for Honda Motor Europe

title: SASOL LIMITED: PRODUCTION AND SALES METRICS FOR THE NINE MONTHS ENDED 31 MARCH 2024
summary: Sasol  has released its production and sales metrics for the nine months ending March 31, 2024. The report can be found on the company's website. The data provides insights into Sasol's performance in production and sales for the specified period.
article: SASOL LIMITED: PRODUCTION AND SALES METRICS FOR THE NINE MONTHS ENDED 31 MARCH 2024 Rhea-AI Impact (Low) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Neutral) Tags Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish Sasol has released its production and sales metrics for the nine months ending March 31, 2024. The report can be found on the company's website. The data provides insights into Sasol's performance in production and sales for the specified period. Sasol ha pubblicato i dati di produzione e vendita relativi ai nove mesi conclusi il 31 marzo 2024. Il rapporto è disponibile sul sito web della compagnia. I dati offrono una panoramica sulle prestazioni di Sasol in termini di produzione e vendite per il periodo specificato. Sasol ha publicado sus métricas de producción y ventas correspondientes a los nueve meses que finalizaron el 31 de marzo de 2024. El informe se puede encontrar en el sitio web de la empresa. Los datos proporcionan una visión sobre el rendimiento de Sasol en producción y ventas durante el período especificado. Sasol은 2024년 3월 31일로 끝나는 9개월 동안의 생산 및 판매 지표를 발표했습니다. 보고서는 회사 웹사이트에서 확인할 수 있습니다. 이 데이터는 지정된 기간 동안 Sasol의 생산 및 판매 성과에 대한 통찰을 제공합니다. Sasol a publié ses données de production et de ventes pour les neuf mois se terminant le 31 mars 2024. Le rapport est disponible sur le site Web de l'entreprise. Les données fournissent des aperçus sur la performance de Sasol en termes de production et de ventes pour la période spécifiée. Sasol hat seine Produktions- und Verkaufszahlen für die neun Monate bis zum 31. März 2024 veröffentlicht. Der Bericht ist auf der Webseite des Unternehmens einsehbar. Die Daten geben Einblick in Sasols Leistung in Produktion und Verkauf für den angegebenen Zeitraum. Positive None. Negative None. 04/23/2024 - 01:25 AM JOHANNESBURG, April 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Sasol has published its production and sales performance metrics for the nine months ended 31 March 2024 on the Company´s website at www.sasol.com, under the Investor Centre section: https://www.sasol.com/investor-centre/financial-results. For further information, please contact:Sasol Investor Relations,Tiffany Sydow, VP Investor Relations Telephone: +27 (0) 71 673 1929 investor.relations@sasol.com View original content:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sasol-limited-production-and-sales-metrics-for-the-nine-months-ended-31-march-2024-302124122.html SOURCE Sasol Limited What are the production and sales metrics released by Sasol for the nine months ending March 31, 2024? Sasol has published its production and sales performance metrics for the nine months ended March 31, 2024 on their website. Where can I find the production and sales metrics report for Sasol for the nine months ending March 31, 2024? The report can be accessed on Sasol 's website under the Investor Centre section. Who can I contact for further information regarding Sasol 's production and sales metrics for the nine months ending March 31, 2024? For additional information, you can contact Sasol Investor Relations at the provided telephone number or email address.

title: CORRECTION: Smog Armor Plans to Create a Pioneering Carbon Capture Concrete Manufacturing Facility Through New Subsidiary
summary: Smog Armor, a subsidiary of Noho, Inc. (DRNK), is launching Monarch Carbon Solutions  to build a cutting-edge facility for advanced carbon capture technologies and sustainable building solutions in Casa Grande, AZ. The facility will use Direct Air Capture technology to extract CO2 from the atmosphere and embed it in concrete products, reducing carbon emissions and creating economic incentives through valuable carbon credits. Monarch will also support monarch butterfly habitats in Southern Arizona, aligning with CEO Rashad A. Davis' commitment to sustainability and environmental preservation.
article: CORRECTION: Smog Armor Plans to Create a Pioneering Carbon Capture Concrete Manufacturing Facility Through New Subsidiary Rhea-AI Impact (No impact) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Positive) Tags Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish Smog Armor, a subsidiary of Noho, Inc. (DRNK), is launching Monarch Carbon Solutions to build a cutting-edge facility for advanced carbon capture technologies and sustainable building solutions in Casa Grande, AZ. The facility will use Direct Air Capture technology to extract CO2 from the atmosphere and embed it in concrete products, reducing carbon emissions and creating economic incentives through valuable carbon credits. Monarch will also support monarch butterfly habitats in Southern Arizona, aligning with CEO Rashad A. Davis' commitment to sustainability and environmental preservation. Smog Armor, una sussidiaria di Noho, Inc. (DRNK), sta lanciando Monarch Carbon Solutions per costruire un'impianto all'avanguardia per tecnologie avanzate di cattura del carbonio e soluzioni edilizie sostenibili a Casa Grande, AZ. L'impianto utilizzerà la tecnologia di Cattura Diretta dell'Aria per estrarre CO2 dall'atmosfera e incorporarla nei prodotti di cemento, riducendo le emissioni di carbonio e creando incentivi economici attraverso preziosi crediti di carbonio. Monarch supporterà anche gli habitat della farfalla monarca nel sud dell'Arizona, in linea con l'impegno del CEO Rashad A. Davis per la sostenibilità e la conservazione ambientale. Smog Armor, una subsidiaria de Noho, Inc. (DRNK), está lanzando Monarch Carbon Solutions para construir una instalación de vanguardia para tecnologías avanzadas de captura de carbono y soluciones de construcción sostenible en Casa Grande, AZ. La facilidad utilizará la tecnología de Captura Directa de Aire para extraer CO2 de la atmósfera e integrarlo en productos de concreto, reduciendo las emisiones de carbono y creando incentivos económicos a través de valiosos créditos de carbono. Monarch también apoyará los hábitats de la mariposa monarca en el sur de Arizona, en consonancia con el compromiso del CEO Rashad A. Davis con la sostenibilidad y la preservación ambiental. Noho, Inc. (DRNK)의 자회사인 스모그 아머는 애리조나주 카사 그란데에서 선진 탄소 포집 기술 및 지속 가능한 건축 솔루션을 위한 최첨단 시설을 구축하기 위해 명나라 탄소 솔루션을 시작하고 있습니다. 이 시설은 직접 공기 포집 기술을 사용하여 대기에서 CO2를 추출하여 콘크리트 제품에 통합함으로써 탄소 배출을 줄이고 귀중한 탄소 크레딧을 통해 경제적 인센티브를 창출할 것입니다. 또한 모나크는 CEO 라샤드 A. 데이비스의 지속 가능성 및 환경 보존에 대한 헌신과 일치하여 애리조나 남부의 나비 서식지를 지원할 것입니다. Smog Armor, une filiale de Noho, Inc. (DRNK), lance Monarch Carbon Solutions pour construire une installation de pointe dédiée aux technologies avancées de capture du carbone et aux solutions de construction durable à Casa Grande, AZ. L'installation utilisera la technologie de Capture Directe de l'Air pour extraire le CO2 de l'atmosphère et l'intégrer dans des produits en béton, réduisant ainsi les émissions de carbone tout en créant des incitations économiques grâce à des crédits carbone précieux. Monarch soutiendra également les habitats du papillon monarque dans le sud de l'Arizona, conformément à l'engagement du PDG Rashad A. Davis en faveur de la durabilité et de la préservation de l'environnement. Smog Armor, eine Tochtergesellschaft von Noho, Inc. (DRNK), startet Monarch Carbon Solutions, um eine hochmoderne Anlage für fortschrittliche Kohlenstoffabscheidungstechnologien und nachhaltige Baumaßnahmen in Casa Grande, AZ, zu errichten. Die Anlage wird die Direkte-Luft-Abscheidungstechnologie nutzen, um CO2 aus der Atmosphäre zu extrahieren und in Betonprodukte einzubetten, wodurch Kohlenstoffemissionen reduziert und wirtschaftliche Anreize durch wertvolle Kohlenstoffzertifikate geschaffen werden. Monarch wird auch die Habitate von Monarchschmetterlingen im Süden Arizonas unterstützen, im Einklang mit dem Engagement des CEO Rashad A. Davis für Nachhaltigkeit und Umweltschutz. Positive Launch of Monarch Carbon Solutions by Smog Armor under Noho, Inc. (DRNK) to create a state-of-the-art facility for carbon capture technologies and sustainable building solutions. Utilization of Direct Air Capture technology to extract CO2 from the atmosphere and embed it in concrete products to reduce carbon emissions. Incorporation of CaptureCrete® technology by Carbon Limit to capture CO2 throughout the lifecycle of concrete products. Transformation of captured carbon into valuable carbon credits for economic growth and environmental impact. Support for monarch butterfly habitats in Southern Arizona and dedication to biodiversity conservation. Personal motivation of CEO Rashad A. Davis to bridge tradition and technology for a sustainable future. Negative None. 04/23/2024 - 02:38 AM (This release corrects the release that was posted earlier to update the video link and the dateline location) SCOTTSDALE, AZ / ACCESSWIRE / April 23, 2024 / Noho, Inc. (OTC PINK:DRNK) Smog Armor is excited to unveil Monarch Carbon Solutions LLC ("Monarch"). Monarch plans to build a 56,000-square-foot state-of-the-art facility dedicated to advanced carbon capture technologies and sustainable building solutions in Casa Grande, AZ.The design of the Monarch facility is intended to harness the power of Direct Air Capture technology to extract CO2 from the atmosphere and embed it within the manufactured concrete products.Further, powered by Carbon Limit's cutting-edge CaptureCrete® technology, these products should also capture CO2 throughout their lifecycle, significantly amplifying their environmental impact and epitomize Smog Armor's commitment to employing innovative technologies for the betterment of our planet.Unique in its approach, we believe that Monarch is poised to transform captured carbon into valuable carbon credits, blending environmental responsibility with economic incentives. The Company believes that its innovative model not only reduces carbon emissions but also could drive economic growth and engage stakeholders in our collective quest for a brighter, sustainable future.Furthermore, in a powerful homage to its namesake, Monarch intends to transform the grounds of the facility into a thriving butterfly sanctuary, to support the migratory Monarch Butterflies (Danaus Plexippus) that traverse Southern Arizona each year. This initiative gains urgency from the December 2021 classification of the migratory monarch butterfly as a threatened species by the International Union for the Conservation of Nature (IUCN). In response, Monarch plans to dedicate a portion of any profits to the restoration and expansion of butterfly habitats across their migratory range, safeguarding the future of these beautiful creatures and biodiversity in the region.Rashad A. Davis, CEO of Smog Armor, expressed his personal motivation behind the launch of the new initiative: "Growing up as a member of the Navajo Nation, instilled a profound respect for nature and a deep-seated desire to bridge the gap between tradition and technology. Surrounded by the natural beauty and the wisdom of my homeland, I learned early on the importance of maintaining harmony between humanity and the environment. Now, as a father of two, my ambitions transcend business achievements; I am deeply committed to ensuring that my children-and theirs-inherit a world where prosperity and sustainability go hand in hand."Through innovation, strategic partnerships, and a shared vision for a sustainable future, Smog Armor continues to lead the charge toward a cleaner, greener planet.Watch Monarch video announcement here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wezeIl8bqcFor further details on Smog Armor's innovative environmental initiatives, visit www.smogarmor.comAbout Smog Armor:Smog Armor is at the forefront of eco-sustainability, dedicated to innovative solutions that positively impact the planet and its inhabitants. Through relentless innovation and strategic collaborations, Smog Armor is crafting a sustainable future for all.CaptureCrete® is a registered trademark of Carbon Limit Co under license to Smog Armor Co.For media inquiries, please contact:Rashad DavisChief Executive OfficerSmog Armor844.476.6427investors@smogarmor.comNOTES ABOUT FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTSExcept for any historical information contained herein, the matters discussed in this press release contain forward-looking statements that involve risks and uncertainties, including those described in the Company's Securities and Exchange Commission reports and filings. Such statements are based upon the Company's current expectations and speak only as of the date made. The Company undertakes no obligation to update any forward-looking statements to reflect events or circumstances after the date on which they are made.SOURCE: Noho, Inc.View the original press release on accesswire.com What is the name of the subsidiary launching the carbon capture facility? The subsidiary launching the carbon capture facility is Monarch Carbon Solutions Where will the state-of-the-art facility for carbon capture technologies be built? The facility for carbon capture technologies will be built in Casa Grande, AZ. How does the facility plan to reduce carbon emissions? The facility plans to reduce carbon emissions by using Direct Air Capture technology to extract CO2 from the atmosphere and embed it in concrete products. What technology will be used to capture CO2 throughout the lifecycle of concrete products? CaptureCrete® technology by Carbon Limit will be used to capture CO2 throughout the lifecycle of concrete products. What economic incentives will be created through the carbon capture process? The carbon capture process will create economic incentives through valuable carbon credits. What environmental initiative will Monarch support in Southern Arizona? Monarch will support monarch butterfly habitats in Southern Arizona. What is the personal motivation of CEO Rashad A. Davis behind the launch of this initiative? CEO Rashad A. Davis is motivated by a commitment to bridge tradition and technology for a sustainable future.

title: KKR and Impilo Announce Strategic Partnership Together With Management in Rare Disease Platform Immedica Pharma
summary: KKR and Impilo announce a strategic partnership to acquire Immedica Pharma, a pharmaceutical company focused on rare diseases. The acquisition includes the launch of the ultra-orphan drug Loargys and an expansion into the U.S. market. Immedica has shown significant growth with revenues of EUR 100m and annual growth of over 50%, positioning itself as a leader in the European rare disease space.
article: KKR and Impilo Announce Strategic Partnership Together With Management in Rare Disease Platform Immedica Pharma Rhea-AI Impact (Low) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Very Positive) Tags partnership Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish KKR and Impilo announce a strategic partnership to acquire Immedica Pharma, a pharmaceutical company focused on rare diseases. The acquisition includes the launch of the ultra-orphan drug Loargys and an expansion into the U.S. market. Immedica has shown significant growth with revenues of EUR 100m and annual growth of over 50%, positioning itself as a leader in the European rare disease space. KKR e Impilo annunciano una partnership strategica per acquisire Immedica Pharma, una società farmaceutica specializzata in malattie rare. L'acquisizione include il lancio del farmaco ultra-orfano Loargys e un'espansione nel mercato statunitense. Immedica ha dimostrato una crescita significativa con ricavi di 100 milioni di EUR e un aumento annuale di oltre il 50%, posizionandosi come leader nel settore delle malattie rare in Europa. KKR e Impilo anuncian una asociación estratégica para adquirir Immedica Pharma, una compañía farmacéutica enfocada en enfermedades raras. La adquisición incluye el lanzamiento del medicamento ultrahuérfano Loargys y una expansión en el mercado de EE. UU. Immedica ha mostrado un crecimiento significativo con ingresos de 100 millones de EUR y un crecimiento anual de más del 50%, posicionándose como líder en el espacio de enfermedades raras en Europa. KKR과 임필로가 희귀 질환에 중점을 둔 제약 회사인 임메디카 파마를 인수하기 위한 전략적 파트너십을 발표했습니다. 이 인수는 초고아약 로아지를 출시하고 미국 시장으로의 확장을 포함합니다. 임메디카는 1억 유로의 수익과 연간 50% 이상의 성장을 보여주며 유럽 희귀 질환 분야에서 리더로 자리매김하고 있습니다. KKR et Impilo annoncent un partenariat stratégique pour acquérir Immedica Pharma, une entreprise pharmaceutique spécialisée dans les maladies rares. L'acquisition comprend le lancement du médicament ultra-orphelin Loargys et une expansion sur le marché américain. Immedica a montré une croissance significative avec des revenus de 100 millions d'EUR et une croissance annuelle de plus de 50%, se positionnant comme un leader dans l'espace des maladies rares en Europe. KKR und Impilo kündigen eine strategische Partnerschaft an, um Immedica Pharma zu übernehmen, ein Pharmaunternehmen, das sich auf seltene Krankheiten spezialisiert hat. Die Übernahme beinhaltet die Einführung des ultra-orphan Arzneimittels Loargys und eine Expansion in den US-Markt. Immedica hat ein signifikantes Wachstum mit Einnahmen von 100 Millionen EUR und einem jährlichen Wachstum von über 50% gezeigt, wodurch es sich als führend im europäischen Markt für seltene Krankheiten positioniert. Positive None. Negative None. 04/23/2024 - 01:00 AM STOCKHOLM & LONDON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Investment funds managed by KKR, a leading global investment firm, have agreed to acquire Immedica Pharma, a pharmaceutical company headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, focused on the commercialization of medicines for rare diseases and specialty care products. Existing owner, Nordic healthcare investment firm Impilo, will reinvest to become an equal owner alongside KKR. The transaction is subject to customary regulatory and closing conditions. KKR and Impilo will work together with Immedica’s management team to support Immedica’s continued growth, including the launch of the recently approved ultra-orphan drug Loargys, additional pipeline assets, and continued in-licensing and M&A. The company is also evaluating an expansion into the U.S. ahead of the regulatory filing and potential approval of Loargys by the U.S. FDA. Immedica Pharma was established in 2018 by Impilo and an experienced management team with a strong track record in launching and commercializing orphan drugs across Europe. The business has built up a portfolio and pipeline of drugs primarily within haematology and oncology as well as genetic and metabolic diseases for rare conditions with high unmet medical need and has quickly expanded into an emerging leader in the European rare disease space, with revenues of EUR 100m and annual growth of more than 50%. Growth catalysts have included a series of in-licensings and acquisitions of drugs for orphan and niche conditions, as well as the organic development of a pan-European and Middle Eastern launch and commercialization organization with over 100 highly skilled employees, supported by the corporate headquarters in Stockholm. Kugan Sathiyanandarajah, Partner and Head of KKR’s Health Care Strategic Growth business in Europe, commented: “The Immedica team is one of the best that we have encountered in a space that we have been following for some time. We are deeply impressed by the accomplishments of Immedica under Impilo’s ownership and the establishment of a rare disease player with a highly promising pipeline. We look forward to working with the management team alongside Impilo to accelerate growth further.” “KKR, with its experience in rare disease and specialty pharma in Europe and the U.S., as well as its global presence and network, is an ideal strategic partner for the next stage of Immedica’s evolution. We are excited to continue our engagement in Immedica, together with KKR, supporting management to realize our joint vision of becoming a leading ultra-rare disease platform and making medicines available to patients with high unmet medical needs,” said Magnus Edlund, partner at Impilo. “I am excited to continue our partnership with Impilo and welcome KKR as a new strategic partner for the next step in Immedica’s journey,” said Anders Edvell, CEO of Immedica. “Since our inception in 2018 backed by Impilo, Immedica has made significant strides towards becoming a leader in the rare disease sector, providing innovative therapies to patients with severe unmet medical needs. I look forward to working alongside both KKR and Impilo as we further our mission, continue to build our organisation, and expand our reach globally.” KKR is investing in Immedica through its KKR Health Care Strategic Growth Fund II, a $4.0 billion fund focused on investing in high-growth health care companies. KKR has a long track record of supporting health care companies globally, having invested approximately $20 billion in the sector since 2004. Impilo was advised by Morgan Stanley & Co. International as financial advisor. Latham & Watkins served as lead legal counsel, with Mannheimer Swartling advising on Swedish legal matters, PwC advising on financial and tax matters, and BCG assisting on commercial matters. KKR was advised by BofA Securities as financial advisor. Gibson Dunn served as lead legal counsel, with Setterwalls advising on Swedish legal matters and Cooley advising on IP and licensing matters, Alvarez & Marsal and PwC advising on financial and tax matters, and Clearview Healthcare Partners assisting on commercial matters. About KKR KKR is a leading global investment firm that offers alternative asset management as well as capital markets and insurance solutions. KKR aims to generate attractive investment returns by following a patient and disciplined investment approach, employing world-class people, and supporting growth in its portfolio companies and communities. KKR sponsors investment funds that invest in private equity, credit and real assets and has strategic partners that manage hedge funds. KKR’s insurance subsidiaries offer retirement, life and reinsurance products under the management of Global Atlantic Financial Group. References to KKR’s investments may include the activities of its sponsored funds and insurance subsidiaries. For additional information about KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR), please visit KKR’s website at www.kkr.com. For additional information about Global Atlantic Financial Group, please visit Global Atlantic Financial Group’s website at www.globalatlantic.com. About Impilo Impilo is a Nordic investment company focused solely on investments in companies operating in the pharmaceutical, medical technology, healthcare services and other health related industries. Our starting point is that our portfolio companies must contribute to a positive and sustainable development of the societies and markets in which they operate in order to remain successful in the long term. Impilo strives to increase value of its investments through long-term active ownership. Impilo has a well-diversified portfolio of healthcare investments and manages c. EUR 1 billion of capital from leading Nordic and international investors. Learn more about Impilo at www.impilo.se. View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240422283835/en/ Immedica Linda Holmström, Head of Communications linda.holmstrom@immedica.com KKR Nordics Fogel & Partners Ludvig Gauffin kkr@fogelpartners.se UK FGS Global Alastair Elwen KKR-Lon@FGSGlobal.com Impilo Magnus Edlund, Partner magnus.edlund@impilo.se Source: KKR What is the strategic partnership announced involving KKR and Impilo? KKR and Impilo have agreed to acquire Immedica Pharma, a pharmaceutical company focused on rare diseases, with Impilo reinvesting to become an equal owner alongside KKR. What are the growth catalysts for Immedica Pharma? Immedica's growth catalysts include in-licensings and acquisitions of drugs for orphan and niche conditions, as well as the organic development of a pan-European and Middle Eastern launch and commercialization organization. What is the investment strategy of KKR in Immedica? KKR is investing in Immedica through its KKR Health Care Strategic Growth Fund II, a $4.0 billion fund focused on investing in high-growth health care companies. Who is the CEO of Immedica Pharma? Anders Edvell is the CEO of Immedica Pharma. What is the focus of Immedica Pharma's medicines? Immedica Pharma focuses on the commercialization of medicines for rare diseases and specialty care products.

title: Stora Enso Oyj: Notification of Change in Holdings according to Chapter 9, Section 10 of the Finnish Securities Markets Act (19 April 2024)
summary: BlackRock, Inc. increased its total holding in Stora Enso Oyj above the 5% threshold on 19 April 2024, according to the notification received. Stora Enso, a key player in the global bioeconomy, specializes in renewable products and sustainable solutions. The company has a significant presence in packaging, biomaterials, and wooden construction, with sales of EUR 9.4 billion in 2023. Stora Enso's shares are listed on multiple stock exchanges, including Nasdaq Helsinki and Nasdaq Stockholm, as well as OTC Markets in the USA.
article: Stora Enso Oyj: Notification of Change in Holdings according to Chapter 9, Section 10 of the Finnish Securities Markets Act (19 April 2024) Rhea-AI Impact (No impact) Rhea-AI Sentiment (Neutral) Tags Rhea-AI Summary English French German Italian Korean Spanish BlackRock, Inc. increased its total holding in Stora Enso Oyj above the 5% threshold on 19 April 2024, according to the notification received. Stora Enso, a key player in the global bioeconomy, specializes in renewable products and sustainable solutions. The company has a significant presence in packaging, biomaterials, and wooden construction, with sales of EUR 9.4 billion in 2023. Stora Enso's shares are listed on multiple stock exchanges, including Nasdaq Helsinki and Nasdaq Stockholm, as well as OTC Markets in the USA. BlackRock, Inc. ha aumentato la sua partecipazione totale in Stora Enso Oyj superando la soglia del 5% il 19 aprile 2024, secondo quanto riportato dalla notifica ricevuta. Stora Enso, un protagonista chiave nell'economia globale della bioeconomia, è specializzata in prodotti rinnovabili e soluzioni sostenibili. L'azienda ha una presenza significativa nel settore degli imballaggi, dei biomateriali e delle costruzioni in legno, con vendite di 9,4 miliardi di euro nel 2023. Le azioni di Stora Enso sono quotate in diverse borse valori, tra cui il Nasdaq Helsinki e il Nasdaq Stoccolma, oltre ai mercati OTC negli USA. BlackRock, Inc. incrementó su participación total en Stora Enso Oyj superando el umbral del 5% el 19 de abril de 2024, según la notificación recibida. Stora Enso, un jugador clave en la bioeconomía global, se especializa en productos renovables y soluciones sostenibles. La compañía tiene una presencia significativa en el área de embalaje, biomateriales y construcción en madera, con ventas de 9,4 mil millones de euros en 2023. Las acciones de Stora Enso están listadas en varios mercados de valores, incluyendo Nasdaq Helsinki y Nasdaq Estocolmo, así como en los mercados OTC en los EE.UU. BlackRock, Inc.는 2024년 4월 19일에 Stora Enso Oyj 지분을 5% 이상으로 증가시켰다고 통보받았습니다. Stora Enso는 글로벌 바이오경제의 핵심 플레이어로, 재생 가능한 제품과 지속 가능한 솔루션을 전문으로 합니다. 이 회사는 포장, 바이오매터리얼, 목조 건축 분야에서 중요한 입지를 가지고 있으며, 2023년에는 94억 유로의 매출을 기록하였습니다. Stora Enso의 주식은 나스닥 헬싱키와 나스닥 스톡홀름을 비롯한 여러 주식 시장에 상장되어 있으며, 미국의 OTC 시장에도 나와 있습니다. BlackRock, Inc. a augmenté sa participation totale dans Stora Enso Oyj, dépassant le seuil de 5% le 19 avril 2024, selon la notification reçue. Stora Enso, un acteur clé de l'économie bio mondiale, est spécialisé dans les produits renouvelables et les solutions durables. L'entreprise occupe une place significative dans les domaines de l'emballage, des biomatériaux et de la construction en bois, avec des ventes de 9,4 milliards d'euros en 2023. Les actions de Stora Enso sont cotées sur plusieurs bourses, y compris le Nasdaq Helsinki et le Nasdaq Stockholm, ainsi que sur les marchés OTC aux États-Unis. BlackRock, Inc. hat seinen Gesamtanteil an Stora Enso Oyj am 19. April 2024 über die 5%-Schwelle erhöht, gemäß der erhaltenen Benachrichtigung. Stora Enso, ein Schlüsselakteur in der globalen Bioökonomie, ist spezialisiert auf erneuerbare Produkte und nachhaltige Lösungen. Das Unternehmen hat eine bedeutende Präsenz in den Bereichen Verpackung, Biomaterialien und Holzbau, mit einem Umsatz von 9,4 Milliarden Euro im Jahr 2023. Die Aktien von Stora Enso sind an mehreren Börsen notiert, einschließlich Nasdaq Helsinki und Nasdaq Stockholm sowie auf den OTC-Märkten in den USA. Positive None. Negative None. 04/23/2024 - 03:05 AM STORA ENSO OYJ STOCK EXCHANGE RELEASE 23 April 2024 at 9:30 EEST HELSINKI, April 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Stora Enso Oyj has received a notification pursuant to chapter 9, section 5 of the Securities Market Act from BlackRock, Inc on 22 April 2024. On 19 April 2024, BlackRock's total holding, including holding through financial instruments, in Stora Enso's shares increased above the 5 percent threshold. % of shares and voting rights (total of 7.A) % of shares and voting rights through financial instruments (total of 7.B) Total of both in % (7.A + 7.B) Resulting situation on the date on which threshold was crossed or reached Below 4.99% shares Below 5% voting rights Below 0.09% shares Below 5% voting rights Below 5.09% shares Below 5% voting rights Position of previous notification(if applicable) Below 5% shares Below 5% voting rights Below 5% shares Below 5% voting rights Below 5% shares Below 5% voting rights A: Shares and voting rights Class/type of shares Number of shares and voting rights % of shares and voting rights Direct (SMA 9:5) Indirect (SMA 9:6 and 9:7) Direct (SMA 9:5) Indirect (SMA 9:6 and 9:7) FI0009005961 39,406,110 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 4.99% shares Below 5% voting rights SUBTOTAL A 39,406,110 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 4.99% shares Below 5% voting rights B: Financial Instruments according to SMA 9:6a Type of financial instrument Expiration date Exercise/ Conversion Period Physical or cash settlement Number of shares and voting rights % of shares and voting rights American Depositary Receipt (US86210M1062) N/A N/A Physical 472,620 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 0.05% shares Below 5% voting rights Securities Lent N/A N/A Physical 163,220 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 0.02% shares Below 5% voting rights CFD N/A N/A Cash 138,730 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 0.01% shares Below 5% voting rights SUBTOTAL B 774,570 shares Below 5% voting rights Below 0.09% shares Below 5% voting rights Stora Enso has two series of shares. Each A share and every ten R shares carry one vote. Stora Enso has 175,979,614 A shares and 612,640,373 R shares in issue. The company does not hold its own shares. The total number of Stora Enso shares is 788,619,987 and the total number votes at least 237,243,651. Full chain of controlled undertakings through which the voting rights and financial instruments are effectively held starting with the ultimate controlling natural person or legal entity is presented in the enclosed annex. Part of the global bioeconomy, Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable products in packaging, biomaterials and wooden construction, and one of the largest private forest owners in the world. We create value with our low-carbon and recyclable fiber-based products, through which we support our customers in meeting the demand for renewable sustainable products. Stora Enso has approximately 20,000 employees and our sales in 2023 were EUR 9.4 billion. Stora Enso shares are listed on Nasdaq Helsinki Oy (STEAV, STERV) and Nasdaq Stockholm AB (STE A, STE R). In addition, the shares are traded in OTC Markets (OTCQX) in the USA as ADRs and ordinary shares (SEOAY, SEOFF, SEOJF). storaenso.com/investors STORA ENSO OYJ CONTACT: Investor enquiries:Anna-Lena ÅströmSVP Investor Relationstel. +46 70 210 7691 This information was brought to you by Cision http://news.cision.com https://news.cision.com/stora-enso-oyj/r/stora-enso-oyj--notification-of-change-in-holdings-according-to-chapter-9--section-10-of-the-finnish,c3965704 The following files are available for download: https://mb.cision.com/Main/13589/3965704/2750893.pdf Annex 2024-04-19 View original content:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/stora-enso-oyj-notification-of-change-in-holdings-according-to-chapter-9-section-10-of-the-finnish-securities-markets-act-19-april-2024-302124227.html SOURCE Stora Enso Oyj What led to the increase in Stora Enso Oyj's total holding by BlackRock, Inc. on 19 April 2024?
